attributes.action: ...require 192.com to remove it's age filter from its search engine.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
192.com has a new feature that allows the public to search for people and addresses filtering the results based on age.  Apart from benign uses of this service it also presents burglars the ability to specifically target vulnerable households in an area.

192.com do not view this as a problem that is worth addressing as the service (which was introduced about 2 months ago) is proving to be very popular.  I believe it is likely to make an existing problem more widespread.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
